body.name: Firestone Firehawk Indy 500 Ultra-High Summer Performance Tire 225/45R17 94 W Extra Load
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 23 hrs 46 mins
features: Ultra-High Summer Performance at a Great Value
Improved water evacuation for more control on wet roads
Improved wet rubber compound and tread deisgn provides 20% shorter stopping distance on wet roads
Proprietary Pulse Groove Technology improves water evacuation and helps increase resistance to hydroplaning
CORNER WITH CONFIDENCE - The latest Firestone Fire hawk Indy 500 tire lets you corner with confidence featuring wide shoulders that increase the tire’s stiffness to provide dynamic cornering

20% SHORTER STOPPING DISTANCE ON WET ROADS - With an improved rubber compound and tread design, the new Indy 500 tire gives you a 20% shorter stopping distance on wet roads, as compared to the prior generation Fire hawk Wide Oval Indy 500 tire

THE PULSE GROOVE CHANNEL HELPS REDUCE THE RISK OF HYDROPLANING - The proprietary Pulse Groove channel in the tread pattern takes water evacuation to the next level helping to improve wet handling* and reduce the risk of hydroplaning
body.description: The Firehawk Indy 500 tire is Firestone's ultimate in sport performance, inspired by our racing heritage. With our new tread design featuring a proprietary Pulse Groove water channel, we have dramatically improved handling and braking on wet roads (as compared to the Firehawk Wide Oval Indy 500 tire). And with a new outer tread design, you can take a corner with great confidence. So if you're a car enthusiast looking for a tire that can provide extreme performance and extreme fun, this is the tire for you. W speed rated.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Firestone Tires: Ready for any challenge Firestone Tires has been setting the standard for quality and service since their founder, Harvey Firestone, worked as a salesman for the Columbus Buggy Company and outfitted their vehicle with pneumatic tires. In 1909, they made the non-skid tread pattern an industry standard that gave their drivers an edge at the Indianapolis 500—60 wins and counting! Firestone has been a household name for generations, but that doesn't mean they'll rest; with plenty of roads ahead, Firestone is eager to carry you to your future destinations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these tires
reviews.reviewText: I drive a 04 vw jetta tdi and average around 30,000 miles commuting to work a year. I love these tires the grip is amazing as long as the proper air pressure is maintained, the grip has saved me a couple of times during aggressive maneuvers and braking to miss animals running out on the road. I have put around 50,000 miles on one set and seem to be doing good other set had about 30,000 miles with one tire having a balance issue that made it go bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great tread design. Just used them for the first time driving through a heavy rainstorm. They did great, no hydroplaning, they cut right though heavy water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like these tires
reviews.reviewText: This is the Second set of had they were good on my 64 impala

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is a great summer tire. Even in the rain it still grips well compared to other summer tires. As for ride quality it dose ride a bit stiffer than before. But Im sure thats do to the stiffer side walls.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great grip and ride.
reviews.reviewText: Great replacement for my run-flats.Great grip and ride. Freeway expansion joint slap greatly reduced.
